location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:70 x 96 mmCondition:The image is in good condition.Foliation:'b'; '34'Process:Silver gelatin print

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:View in Koweit [Kuwait] outside the customs house, which is presumably the low-lying structure on the right of the photograph. A large crowd of men are gathered at the entrance, while others appear to be walking towards the building. On the right, a boy looks directly towards the camera. In the left background the masts of boats anchored in the harbour can be seen.Inscriptions:Lower left, below image, in pen: ‘Koweit.’Upper left, above image, in pencil, crossed-out: ‘a’Lower right, alongside image, in pencil: ‘35’Lower right, below image, in pen: ‘Customs House.’ ‘(Feb. 1918)’
